full_text: fede aoe IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM 2018/KER/743 PRESENT: THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE B.KEMAL PASHA MONDAY, THE 8TH DAY OF JANUARY 2018 / 18TH POUSHA, 1939 Crl.MC.No. 8978 of 2017 C.C.NO. 1990/2017 OF JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT-I,HOSDURG CRIME NO. 408/2017 OF AMBALATHARA POLICE STATION PETITIONER (S) /ACCUSED_: 1 KRIPESH.K, AGED 24 YEARS, S/O.KUNHIKRISHNAN, R/AT VANIYAM VEEDU, ERIYA, HOSDURG TALUK. 2 ASKER ALI, AGED 24 YEARS, S/O.MUHAMMED, R/AT PAZHAYA KADAPPURAM, KANHANGAD VILLAGE, HOSDURG TALUK. BY ADV.SRI.P.K.SUBHASH RESPONDENT (S) /STATE/COMPLAINANT : 1. STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM.682 031. 2. RIYAS M.A, AGED 22 YEARS, S/O.ASEEZ, AVIYIL HOUSE, KANHANGAD VILLAGE, HOSDURG TALUK- 671 315. 3. RISHAD M.A, AGED 19 YEARS, S/O.ASEEZ, AVIYIL HOUSE, KANHANGAD VILLAGE, HOSDURG TALUK- 671 315. 4. RASHID M.A, AGED 20 YEARS, S/O.ASEEZ, AVIYIL HOUSE, KANHANGAD VILLAGE, HOSDURG TALUK.671 315. R1 BY SR.PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SRI.B.JAYASURYA R2 TO R4 BY ADV. SRI.A.ARUNKUMAR THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 08-01-2018, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Msd. Drea rari Rade deals aoe Crl.MC.No. 8978 of 2017 2018/KER/743 APPENDIX PETITIONER(S)' ANNEXURES : ANNEXURE AIL A TRUE COPY OF THE F.I.R IN CRIME NO.408 OF 2017 OF AMBALATHARA POLICE STATION. ANNEXURE AIT A TRUE COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT IN CRIME NO.408 OF 2017 OF AMBALATHARA POLICE STATION. ANNEXURE AIII A TRUE COPY OF THE AFFIDAVIT SWORN TO BY THE 2ND RESPONDENT. ANNEXURE AIV A TRUE COPY OF THE AFFIDAVIT SWORN TO BY THE 3RD RESPONDENT. ANNEXURE AV A TRUE COPY OF THE AFFIDAVIT SWORN TO BY THE 4TH RESPONDENT. RESPONDENT (S) ' ANNEXURES : NIL //TRUE COPY// P.S.TO JUDGE Msd. 2018/KER/743 B. KEMAL PASHA, J. Dated this the 8" day of January, 2018 ORDER Petitioners are the accused in CC No.1990/2017 of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-l, Hosdurg, which has arisen from Crime No.408/2017 of Ambalathara Police Station for the offences punishable under Sections 341, 323 and 324 read with Section 34 IPC. 2. It seems that the matter has been amicably settled between the petitioners and the de_ facto complainant, who is the 2 respondent herein. Respondents 3 and 4 are the other injured. 3. Respondents 2 to 4 have filed Annexures-Alll, AlV and AV affidavits respectively, affirming that the matter has been amicably settled between them and the petitioners and presently, they have no complaints against the petitioners. When the matter is settled between the 2018/KER/743 Crl.M.C.8978/2017 5. parties, no purpose would be served in proceeding with the matter further. Matters being so, all further proceedings against the petitioners in CC No.1990/2017 of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-l, Hosdurg, which has arisen from Crime No.408/2017 of Ambalathara Police Station, can be quashed. In the result, this Crl.M.C. is allowed and all further proceedings against the petitioners in CC No.1990/2017 of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-l, Hosdurg, which has arisen from Crime No.408/2017 of Ambalathara Police Station, are quashed. Sd/- (B.KEMAL PASHA, JUDGE) aks/08/01 // True Copy // PS to Judge
